evs.products.plots.defaults.boxplotutilities
Class BoxPlotRenderer

java.lang.Object
  org.jfree.chart.renderer.AbstractRenderer
      org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy.AbstractXYItemRenderer
          evs.products.plots.defaults.boxplotutilities.BoxPlotRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.jfree.chart.LegendItemSource, org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy.XYItemRenderer
public class BoxPlotRenderer
extends org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy.AbstractXYItemRenderer
implements org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy.XYItemRenderer

A renderer that draws box plot items on an XYPlot.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

public BoxPlotRenderer(double boxWidth)
Creates a new renderer.

Use -1 for the box width if you prefer the width to be calculated automatically.

Parameters:
boxWidth - the box width.

setBoxWidth

public void setBoxWidth(double boxWidth)
Sets the box width.

If you set the width to a negative value, the renderer will calculate the box width automatically based on the space available on the chart.

Parameters:
boxWidth - the box width.

drawItem

public void drawItem(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                     org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy.XYItemRendererState state,
                     java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D dataArea,
                     org.jfree.chart.plot.PlotRenderingInfo info,
                     org.jfree.chart.plot.XYPlot plot,
                     org.jfree.chart.axis.ValueAxis domainAxis,
                     org.jfree.chart.axis.ValueAxis rangeAxis,
                     org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset dataset,
                     int series,
                     int item,
                     org.jfree.chart.plot.CrosshairState crosshairState,
                     int pass)
Draws the visual representation of a single data item.

Specified by:
drawItem in interface org.jfree.chart.renderer.xy.XYItemRenderer
Parameters:
g2 - the graphics device.
state - the renderer state.
dataArea - the area within which the plot is being drawn.
info - collects info about the drawing.
plot - the plot (can be used to obtain standard color information etc).
domainAxis - the domain axis.
rangeAxis - the range axis.
dataset - the dataset.
series - the series index (zero-based).
item - the item index (zero-based).
crosshairState - crosshair information for the plot (null permitted).
pass - the pass index.
